author: Kim Lyons
title: Instagram’s cofounders built a website to track state-by-state spread of COVID-19
description: Using data from the Covid Tracking Project, the cofounders of Instagram created RT.live to track the state-by-state spread of COVID-19 in the US, tracking the average number of people who catch the virus from one infected person.
content:
The site relies on data gathered by the Covid Tracking Project
Photo by Smith Collection/Gado/Getty Images
Using data from the Covid Tracking Project, the cofounders of Instagram created a website to track the state-by-state spread of COVID-19 in the US, Bl… [+1098 chars]
